ThingDef.label: propelled arm
ThingDef.description:
Military synthetic prosthesis identical to an organic limb. It sacrifices the superior performance of bionics for the capacity to conceal armament within its hull.

This implant is part of the <color=#c74228>Draco Partes</color>. Its flame-producing generator enables wide use in cold environments, keeping soldiers at a safe temperature as long as it remains dry.

The propelled arm is used by burly operatives, allowing them to slam their opponents against walls with ease, granting them superiority in hand-to-hand combat.

ThingDef.label: launcher arm
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial arm. Silenced mini-servos give great strength, while the biogel nerve-link gives exquisite control. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological arm in almost every way.
